ccTransmittal: Online credit card gifts for calendar year may be made via the UIF credit card transmittal until 11:59 p.m. CST on December 31. Transactions received after 11:59 p.m. CST on December 31 will be calendar year gifts.
otherPaymentPages: Online credit card gifts for calendar year may be made via the giving website until 11:59 p.m. CST on December 31. Transactions received after 11:59 p.m. CST on December 31 will be calendar year gifts.
